definition: faithful (to the memory of betrothed)/constant (of widow who remains unmarried)
to guard/to defend/to keep watch/to abide by the law/to observe (rules or ritual)/nearby/adjoining

festival/holiday/node/joint/section/segment/part/to economize/to save/to abridge/moral integrity/classifier for segments, e.g. lessons, train wagons, biblical verses/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: For seven days eat bread made without yeast and on the seventh day hold a festival to the Lord.
sentences.chinese: 你要吃无酵饼七日，到第七日要向耶和华守节。

sentences.english: Three times a year you are to celebrate a festival to me.
sentences.chinese: 一年三次，你要向我守节。

sentences.english: Seven days thou shalt eat unleavened bread， and in the seventh day shall be a feast to the LORD.
sentences.chinese: 你要吃无酵饼七日，到第七日要向耶和华守节。
